definition: permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory

sentences.english: Could keep the file or document for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 可永久性保存檔案或文件。

sentences.english: For non-batch programs, stopping the collector forever is not an option.
sentences.chinese: 對於非批處理程序，永久停止收集器並非好的選擇。

sentences.english: The melt of slim yellow and pink is deducing the subject of love forever.
sentences.chinese: 昏黃與粉色調的交織，輕輕演繹永久不變的愛的主題。

sentences.english: You don't choose five permanents you control until Clarion Ultimatum resolves.
sentences.chinese: 結算號召通牒時，你才需要選擇五個永久物。

sentences.english: “Forever” multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 永久牌變速跑車在你們的市場上一定很暢銷。

sentences.english: Permanently store the new scale for future use.
sentences.chinese: 永久儲存新的比額表，供今後使用。

sentences.english: Tailor-made dynamic contact resistance of gold hit the brake trigger switch, a permanent warranty.
sentences.chinese: 黃金接點特製耐動擊剎車觸發開關，永久保用。

sentences.english: Rayon of permanent and can be removed.
sentences.chinese: 粘膠劑的永久性和可移除性。

sentences.english: The most feared punishment is the defamation lawsuit which can result in permanent financial ruin.
sentences.chinese: 最令人懼怕的是會造成永久破財的毀謗官司。

sentences.english: But that son is now a junior in high school, and he won't be in the house forever.
sentences.chinese: 不過小兒女如今已經上了高外，他不會永久呆在家裏。

sentences.english: It is permanent or nonvolatile storage, such as the data stored on diskettes.
sentences.chinese: 它是永久或非易失性存儲，如軟盤上存儲的數據。

sentences.english: New mechanic called vanishing which uses time counters on permanents.
sentences.chinese: 有個名爲消散的機制會在永久物上使用計時指示物。

sentences.english: He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了那麼多年煙，牙齒都被永久地薰黃了。

sentences.english: Forever fire resistance is made from aramid materials, with high cost on production.
sentences.chinese: 永久性防火線爲芳綸材料製成，成本較高。

sentences.english: "The last thing Iran wants to see is a permanent American presence in its backyard," says Aslan.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗最不想看到的是美國在其後院永久的存在。

sentences.english: Turning to the Rotary Foundation, I would like to share with you our vision on TRF Permanent Fund at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我想在此與各位分享我們對扶輪永久基金的未來前景。

definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
to sequester/to seal up (for safe keeping)/to freeze (an account)/to mothball
to keep/to preserve/extant/to remain (from the past)
